Extensions.File:
do { $name = Read-Host -Prompt 'Enter computer name (without the "am-" prefix, 1–12 chars letters/numbers/hyphens)'
# Optional: strip accidental leading/trailing spaces $name = $name.Trim()
} while ( -not $name -or $name.Length -gt 12 -or # 12 chars + "am-" = max 15 total $name -notmatch '^[A-Za-z0-9]([A-Za-z0-9-]{0,11})?$' )
# Always ensure prefix is present $finalName = "am-$name"
return $finalName
